attributes.action: Request the Queen refuses Royal Assent to any law that attempts to stop Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: There is an ongoing attempt by Parliament to stop the wishes of the people to leave the EU, further to this they also refuse to hold a General election, the intent is clear in that they DO NOT want to leave the EU against a legal vote by the people to Leave. Their position is undemocratic and against the people's rights, any and all laws put forward with the intent of stopping a legal vote must be refused Royal assent by her Majesty the Queen..!!
attributes.background: Parliament is refusing to implement a legal vote by the people to leave the EU. The situation is clear, Parliament want to stop the legal vote by the people against their will..!!!
